TEXT.S:
Ecuadoru Ecuadorsa ilabu nu Congnanmeico, itiza i 2 00 S, 77 30 W u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 283,561 km2u ahebal nu lalaay sa izaw ku 276,841 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 6,720 km2hamin nu tademawan sa 16,080,778. kakalukan umah sa 29.70%, kilakilangan umah sa 38.90%, zumaay henay umah sa 31.40%. Ecuadormasakaputay makumud a kanatal Spaina kamu: República del Ecuador) pulung Ecuador, u naitida i Nan-mei-culsatip nu amisan namakaydaay i Cung-kulmalimad muenen, saamisan sa micapi tu Columbia, nu timulan malitin tu Peru, capi i wali nu waliyu, atu Ci-liatu Nan-mei-culcaay katatepal tu Brazil, nu dumaan a niyadu' silaed tu Ecuadornu lala' idaw ku 1,000 kung-li i Cya-la-pa-kea subal.[1] :República del Ecuador 1,000 Ecuadori 1809 a mihcaan waluay idaw ku cacay bataan patukuh a miliyas tu Spaina nikuwanan masacacay sakelec ku nida sa patideng tu kanatal. ya u telekelalpatelek tu Ecuadora kanatalan, sisa u Spainuyni u telekelal (ecuador) palu kanatal nu ngangan, zayhan kina kanatal idaw ku kasingangan han tu, hakya mahini yadah ku pada' kyu pangangan hantu tu "pada' a kanatal". u tatangahan a tusu i Pi-cing-cau silamalay a buyu' u kitidaan kya buyu', namakay bayu nu telek katalakaw 2,850 a depah, sisa kina tusu u sakatusa katalakaw i kitakiay a tusu (mikilul tu i Pu-li-wya-yaa tusu nu La-pa-si).[2] 1809810ecuadorc""""2,850
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Quito.
kakininan nu kanatal demiadkakining nu kanatal demiad sa 10 bulad 8 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Lenín Moreno [3] (Linin.Mulyenuwa · [4]), 1953 a mihca 3 a bulad 19 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Ecuador ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2017 a mihca 5 bulad 24 demiad.
laylayu nu aydaay a laylay, u Ecuadora laylay taneng mikilim tu nu tulu a malebud lima a lasubu a mihcaan nu ayawan. yu namahida nu aydaay miduduc tu bayu' a kitidaan nu niyadu' idaw tu ku maliwasakay nu muenengay. i 1463 a mihcaan malu nu Incaa kanatal ku nikahida. i Spainmakatepa tu baluhayay sa, u Ecuadori 1532 a mihcaan debungan nu Spaina tademaw, namahayda maselep tu ku Spainnu malimatay a tademaw i kitidaan pina tu hakya a lasubuan nu mihca.[5] 14631532 1809 a mihcaan walu a bataan idaw ku cacay a bataan misakamu a masacacay, nika kalankan maala aca nu Spain, misadakay tu pinaay tu nu mihcaan, 1822 a mihcaan kya u tatengaay tu miales tu Spainnipikuwan. 1825 a mihcaan milabu tu tabakiay a Columbiamasakaputay mapulung a kanatal, nika kina kanatal i 1830 a mihcaan maliwasak. u Ecuadora masakaputay mapulung a kanatal kyu patideng.[6] 1809810182218251830 ya kanatal nanipatideng caay kacakad ku cen-cenu Ecuador, u micudaday atu hitayay a nika kutakutay nu sihu makatukuh cacay idaw ku siwa, naw 1979 a mihcaan u tatengaay tu u micudaday a sihu ku mikuwanay, patideng tu hulic, hida han miyun tu tusa a bataan nu mihcaan.[7] 191979 2007 a mihcaan sepad a bulad idaw ku sabaw tu lima a demiad, u minaluan atu ku panutek, paketung a patideng wamisahulic tu nikayki, misanga tu baluhay a hulic. 2007415 2019 a mihcaan enen a bulad idaw ku sabaw tusa, Ecuadoru nu satalakaway a nipikikung paayaw tu tatayna atu tatayna tatama atu tatama mikikung a malacawa, u nipalucek tu cudad i 2019 a mihcaan pitu a bulad idaw ku walu a demiad u nipaayawen a nisulit u tatengaay tu kya nikalaacawa tu tatayna u tatayna atu tatama u tatama a malaacawaay tu pacudad. 2019612201978 i 2019 a mihcaan cacay a bataan, Ecuadora sihu namilawpes tu sapadansu tu simal nu sapaaca katuud ku mikawanay, u sihu sa limaden ku tusu Ci-tulpatayda i satabakiay a niyadu' i Kua-ya-ci-ermisakawaw.[8] 201910
kitidaanEcuadori Nan-mei-culnu satipan a kanatal, micapi tu waliyu atu telekelal, kina telekelal (u kamu nu Spain:Ecuador) mibesul kina lala' nu kanatal, u nani Ecuador malu nu ngangan tu nu kanatal. Ecuadoridaw kya kapahay a dahat nu liwliw, u lala' nu lanatal pangkiw i buyubuyuan ku 38% u kilakilangan amin, macapi tu tukus nu bayu i sawalian a kitidaan sa u masaenalay ku liwliw nu lala', u talakaw ya masawahulay nu buyu' salikeliked sa masabacabacal, idaw ku liken atu tabelacay a kulit salengac sa i An-ti-sia butu', u yu Ke-tul-pa-siu silamalay a buyu' i kitaki u satabakiay u satalakaway a silamalay a buyu'. u Ecuadoryadah ku talawadaw u namakayda i timul miduduc saan militing i Peru.[9] :EcuadorEcuador38%
kenis atu likut tu kanatal2,237283,561 (708 )(1,529) 2835202768416720 Ecuadori satipan nu waliyu, idaw ku 2,237 km nu sadipasan, u ahebal nu lala' 283,561 km2. Ecuadornu saamisan atu Columbialaed malcapi (708 km) atu sawali nu timuan atu Perumalalidemuh tu (1,529 kun-li). Ecuadorhamin u ahebal nu lala' 28 a mang 3,520 km2. pasu nu Ciya-la-pa-kea subal. sikasan, u ahebal nu lala' 27 aman idaw ku 6,841 km2, u nanum nu ahebal 6,720 km2. i Nan-mei-cul, Ecuadoru ahebal nu lala' kiahebalan ku Uruguay, Suriname, Guyanaatu tungus nu France a Guyana.[10]
tusuEcuadora tusu u sakatusa yadah ku tabakiay a tusu. u satabakiay a tusu i Kuwa-ya-ci-er. u dumaay sakahenulan nu tusu idaw ku Kun-ka, An-pa-tul, Pul-tu-wei-ye-hul, Ma-ca-la, Lul-ha.[11]
manamecEcuadoru matanengay ku nikaudip maka malingatuay a kanatal, u manamecay u milihidaay a simalay ku sakaudip, u sakatahkal nu malukay a tuud u sasazayliawan. 2000 a mihcaan kina kanatal micuduh tu nu Amilikay a kalisiw ku nipikuwan, namahida satu sa sikacacekin tu ku tademaw makai' tu nu aydaay a nipikakuwan kyu mapaales, nika malaheci tu nu Amilika a kalisiw midayli tu sangalep ku mahiniay u tung-ho-pun-cangu kasenengan nikacaay kacakad ku malumanay a kalisiw nu Su-ke-lei. Ecuadoru salengacay nu hana u siwni Lan han kya hana nu kanatal, u palang a kakawsan nu An-ti-sia kanatal.[12] 2000
tademawEcuadora kanatal u ahebal nu lala' tusa idaw ku walu a mang tulu malebud lima lasubu idaw ku enan a bataan nu pin-hawan-kun-li, u tademaw 1522 amang 3680 ku tademaw (2011 a mihcaan a nasulitan), naw u Spainnu malimatay a tademaw, i labu nu tademaw yadah ku caayay kalecad, masanad ku Yin-Omalamelay nu tademaw (May-se-ti-sul a tademaw, Mestizos) u tademaw hamin idaw ku 41%, u Indiana tademaw 34%, u salengacay a tademaw 15%, namahini satu idaw hen ku makay Africapataydaen i Nan-mei-culpalakalungen kya tademawan u lumeniay a tademaw atu lumeniay salengacay u makungkuay tu tademaw. mahida tu nu La-tin-mei-culkatuuday a kanatal, Ecuadora nieneng u nipisinciya sa nu malamelay tu Indiana laylayan ku pasayda i tinsukiw, u tatangahan a kamu nu Spain, nika u Indiana binacadan u nu Ke-ciw-yaku kamu.[13] 28356015223680 2011Mestizos41%34%15%
